message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with cross-lingual semantic textual similarity systems. It may also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it discusses the use of linear transformations and unsupervised techniques. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as it deals with sentence similarity and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves natural language processing. Finally, it may also fall under cs.CV (Computer Vision) as it discusses the use of word weighting, which is a common technique in image processing.
